links.*: Battle of the Field of Celebrant
Cirion and Eorl and the Friendship of Gondor and Rohan

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|2501|2505|2509|2510|2512|2515|2523}}
==Within this year==
* [[Celebrían]] departs over [[Belegaer|Sea]].<ref name="TA">{{App|TA}}</ref>

==March==
* 10 [[Cirion]] sends the first messengers to the [[Éothéod]].<ref name="TA2510">{{UT|Cirion}}</ref>
* 25 [[Borondir]] delivers Cirion's plea for help to [[Eorl the Young]].<ref name="TA2510"/>

==March - April==
* [[Wainrider/Balchoth War]]: [[Orcs]] and [[Balchoth]] overrun [[Calenardhon]].<ref name="TA"/>

==April==
* 6 [[Eorl the Young]] and his ''[[éoherë]]'' set out for [[Gondor]].<ref name="TA2510"/>
* 15 A [[Gondorian]] army moves north and fights the [[Balchoth]] north of the [[Limlight]]; a horde of [[Orcs of the Misty Mountains|Orcs]] from the [[Misty Mountains]] surrounds them.<ref>{{App|Stewards}}</ref> [[Eorl the Young]] comes to their aid and [[Battle of the Field of Celebrant|wins the victory]] of the [[Field of Celebrant]].<ref name="TA"/><ref name="TA2510"/>

==August==
* The [[Oath of Cirion|Oaths]] of [[Cirion]] and [[Eorl the Young]] are spoken; [[Calenardhon]] is ceded to the [[Éothéod]] and becomes the Kingdom of [[Rohan]].<ref name="TA"/><ref name="TA2510"/>
* [[Eorl the Young]] returns to the North; he brings the [[Rohirrim]] to settle in [[Calenardhon]].<ref name="TA"/>
